t: A major bike brand is now selling on Amazon
s: 1 month ago - Direct to consumer bike brand Canyon has long offered bikes for sale via their own website. Now, buyers in the US can purchase many popular Canyon bikes on Amazon.

t: You can now buy Canyon bikes on Amazon in the US as German brand becomes the first major bike manufacturer to list on the platform | Cyclingnews
s: 1 month ago - American buyers can now buy a Canyon mountain bike, urban bike or electric bike on Amazon, will road and gravel bikes follow?
